Pre-Game Insights: Guardians face the Royals for the final time in the 2024 regular season.
Starting pitchers: RHP Ben Lively (Guardians) vs. RHP Seth Lugo (Royals).
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game is at Kauffman Stadium at 7:40 p.m. ET.
Bally Sports Great Lakes, WTAM 1100 AM, WMMS 100.7 FM, and the Guardians Radio Network will carry the game.
